value.title: How to do Pagination on a REST API in Power Query (Part 1)
value.excerpt: In today's video, I am going to show you how to implement pagination when the number of pages or records to be returned are known. value.title: Can you use Power Query Dynamic M Parameters for multi-select?

value.title: Embed a dashboard from Power BI into your application
